name: Pasapalabras
description:
If you are playing a prepared game, click on a letter to reveal the prompt / question. The answer starts with the letter you clicked on! Try to get them all right!

If you are preparing a game, write out a different prompt and answer for each letter. Note that you can skip letters and they will not appear in the game itself. Then save and play!

You can read more about this game on this blog post.
